TopicTitle: Jebidiah is off his meds again

Articles.Content: ok, i was just playing, and i decided to switch around, and i came upon this:
It is well known that Jeb can defy the laws of nature when he needs to.

Hey Pootis, we actually have a specialized thread for screenshots in the general discussion forum. It's at the top of the page highlighted in orange. This fan-art board is more meant for drawings, renderings, or sketches.

It is well known that Jeb can defy the laws of nature when he needs to.

This is true. Has helped occasionally.
